content.query:
use oxemarine_ldw
GO

if object_id('silver.faultcode') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.faultcode
GO
-- cant delete file here in sql
-- use synapse pipeline then execute this script

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.faultcode
WITH (
    DATA_SOURCE = oxemarine_src,
    LOCATION = 'silver/faultcode',
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
)
AS 
SELECT *
    FROM bronze.fault_code
;

select * from silver.faultcode
